basic.blooming: Flowering period June-September, fruit period July-November
basic.color: Flower color purple, fruit color yellow

maintenance.soil: Loose, fertile, and well-drained humus soil
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sufficient sunlight, resistant to shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
